name: NapRoute
description: Duration-based route planning for nap drives

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: NapRoute needs your location to calculate nap routes starting from your current position and provide turn-by-turn navigation during your drive.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: NapRoute needs your location to provide continuous navigation during your nap drive, even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: NapRoute sends notifications to alert you when your nap route is about to end, so you can prepare for your child waking up.
